document_data.name: Tinker
document_data.mainbody: '''Tinker''' was a [[gnome]] caught by [[bugbears]] in [[Mount Dread]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He had a secret project that required a [[silver]] spring.
document_data.Possessions: He had found a silver spring he needed.
document_data.History: During the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], Tinker was in [[Mount Dread]] looking for a silver spring when he got captured by [[bugbear]]s. If adventurers came across these bugbears, they'd catch 'em arguing over what to do with him. If the adventurers prevailed over those bugbears it is likely that they let him escape.
